name: Observalis
description:
Observalis is an AI-only strategy game. Watch nations randomly build their forces, form alliances, and conquer provinces. If you're fascinated by maps and alternate history, you'll be interested in the weird final maps that result. Inspired by hundreds of hours of watching AI-only grand strategy games and, recently, Drew Durnil's homemade battle simulator videos.

NOTE: I haven't done any optimization yet (boring), so the game currently takes a long time to load after the initial Unity splash screen. I plan to fix that, but for now just give it a bit.

 If enough people show intere$t, I'll work on the planned features and release updates.

Features
  • Random AI-only map battles
  • Custom game rules
  • Randomized peace deals
  • Political and Alliance map modes
  • Generated alliance names
  • Dice-driven battle system
  • USA map

  

Controls 
  •  Advance turn: SPACE 
  •  Move camera: ARROW KEYS 
  •  Zoom camera: MOUSEWHEEL
  •  Switch map mode: M 
  •  Show/hide spinner: V
  •  Reset: R 
  •  Quit: ESC
